chapter.title: Adding a new predicate detection algorithm to MIPA
chapter.para: This chapter is for developers who use MIPA. Under construction.

sect1.title: Adding the new non-checker process
sect1.para: This section describes interfaces which the non-checker process can access. Steps of creating a new non-checker process will be presented here.

sect1.title: Adding the new checker process
sect1.para: This section describes interfaces which the checker prcoess can access. Steps of creating a new checker process will be presented here.
